https://tmrev.io/movie/129416-Amorosa: The Revenge 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/s3YrddzVAd5CDQkgLbMptFjtNA7.jpg After suffering from a vehicular accident, Rosa and her sons transfer to the province. She hopes that the new place will heal the rift between her and her younger son, Rommel. Little does she know that their lives will be at risk when the vengeful ghost of the woman without face threatens them. As she struggles to find a way to end the hauntings, she discovers a truth that will change her life forever. Amorosa: The Revenge
